rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
notes:
New card — replaced Read the Bones

Since we already have draw N, lose N on a creature in the set, I figured we’d like an altar reap for the spell version of this effect
